DOC.brief_summary: The survey is conducted to collect safety and effectiveness information in Parkinson's Disease patients treated with Pramipexole without concomitant L-Dopa supplementation in the daily clinical settings in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Special Survey on Parkinson's Disease (PD) Patients Without Concomitant Use of L-Dopa
DOC.criteria: Patients with Parkinson's disease who do not receive LDopa supplementation Patients should have been treated according to the Japanese insert slip
